error_details.explanation: Incorrect final answer. An intermediate value 'remaining_sq_ft' (value: 70) was reported instead of 'boxes_needed' (value: 7.0).

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 70
The entire sq ft of the living room is LxW so the room is 16x20 = <<16*20=320>>320 sq ft
Tom has already put down 250 sq ft so he needs to put down 320-250 = 70 sq ft of flooring
